alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:41PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Chelan County through 515 PM PDT... At 441 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Leavenworth moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Merrit, Chumstick, Winton, Ida Creek Campground, Tumwater Campground, Eightmile Campground, Bridge Creek Campground, Eight Mile Campground, Rock Island Campground, Chatter Creek Campground, Plain, Riverside Campground, White Pine Campground, Johnny Creek Campground, and French Creek Campground. This includes U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 71 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
